content.raw:
Okay, I moved the world file to the public worlds folder. I probably thought about writing a test for the plugin, but anyways, it’s not a problem to use the public world in a test, it? 

Furthermore, I kind of investigated how to make a conceptually better keyboard control plugin, and I already have something, but that’s gonna be a bigger one and will probably need some time to settle down, so I’ll keep it separate from this one and make another PR when it’s ready for a first peek :slight_smile:
content.html:
Okay, I moved the world file to the public worlds folder. I probably thought about writing a test for the plugin, but anyways, it’s not a problem to use the public world in a test, it?

Furthermore, I kind of investigated how to make a conceptually better keyboard control plugin, and I already have something, but that’s gonna be a bigger one and will probably need some time to settle down, so I’ll keep it separate from this one and make another PR when it’s ready for a first peek
